citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
The facility representative was not able to locate any of the records during the inspection. Missing records included the
Program of Veterinary Care, acquisition forms, inventory records, disposition forms, the contingency plan, and the
environment enhancement plans for the birds. Not being able to locate the records doesn't allow for APHIS officials to
ensure that veterinary care is being provided as per the directives in the Program of Veterinary Care, doesn't allow for
APHIS officials to properly track animals going through the licensee's facility, doesn't allow APHIS officials to ensure a
proper emergency management plan is in place, and doesn't allow APHIS officials to ensure a proper environment
enhancement plan is in place for the birds. The licensee must be able to locate and provide all required records to APHIS
officials during future inspections. Correct by 11/23/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
End of report.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
The facility representative was not able to locate any of the records during the inspection. Missing records included the 
Program of Veterinary Care, acquisition forms, inventory records, disposition forms, the contingency plan, and the 
environment enhancement plans for the birds. Not being able to locate the records doesn't allow for APHIS officials to 
ensure that veterinary care is being provided as per the directives in the Program of Veterinary Care, doesn't allow for 
APHIS officials to properly track animals going through the licensee's facility, doesn't allow APHIS officials to ensure a 
proper emergency management plan is in place, and doesn't allow APHIS officials to ensure a proper environment 
enhancement plan is in place for the birds. The licensee must be able to locate and provide all required records to APHIS 
officials during future inspections. Correct by 11/23/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
End of report.
